question: Which body has submitted its recommendations to the Government of India for privatization of 12 public sector undertakings?
explanation:
The national think tank NITI Aayog has submitted its recommendations to the Government of India on privatization of 12 public sector undertakings.
These organizations belong to strategic sectors defined by the Government and the final decision would be made by Department of Investment and Public Asset Management (DIPAM), and the Core Group of Secretaries on Divestment (CGD).
